smsFormat.regex_Format: (?i).*INR.? [[amount]] debited from HDFC Bank [[account]] on [[date]]. Info: UPI-[^-]*-[[to]]-.*
(?i).*Rs.? [[amount]] debited from a/c [[account]] on [[date]] to VPA [[to]]\(UPI Ref.*
(?i).*Rs.? [[amount]] credited to a/c [[account]] on [[date]] by a/c linked to VPA [[to]] \(UPI Ref.*
(?i).*INR.? [[amount]] deposited in HDFC Bank A/c [[account]] on [[date]] for [^-]*-[^-]*-[[to]]-.*
(?i).*Spent Rs.? ?[[amount]] On HDFC Bank Card [[account]] At #? ?[[to]] On [[date]]:[[time]]\..*
